articles.title: Europe's 'dark universe' Euclid spacecraft ready for July 1 SpaceX launch - Space.com
articles.description: Liftoff is scheduled for 11:11 a.m. ET on Saturday (July 1).
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, FLORIDA — Europe's dark universe hunter is ready to leave its home planet.

articles.title: Europe is home to the world's heaviest drinkers. Which country drinks the most alcohol? - Euronews
articles.description: Among the 10 countries that drink the most in the world, nine are in the EU. But there are big differences between nations.
articles.content:
